name: Butter Chicken Naan Pizza
description: Simple recipe for butter chicken pizza with storebought sauce, tandoori chicken, onions, cheese, mozzarella cheese, and fresh cilantro.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked chicken breast, cut into chunks
instructions: Preheat oven to 425F. Spread butter chicken sauce on the naan bread. Sprinkle with some of the grated mozzarella. Place onion slices evenly on the flatbread. Toss the chunks of cooked chicken in the tandoori spice blend until well coated. Place on the naan bread. Sprinkle with remaining grated cheese. Bake in the oven for 7-10 minutes or until the cheese in just starting to bubble and the edge of the naan bread is browned. Remove from the oven. Garnish with the chopped fresh cilantro.
